snippet: The report will recommend changes and provide details about the company’s reaction after discovering faulty auto ignition switches and its failure to seek immediate recalls.
abstract: General Motors will release results of its three-month internal investigation into events leading up to recall of 2.6 million small cars with defective ignition switches.
lead_paragraph: The report will recommend changes and provide details about the company’s reaction after discovering faulty auto ignition switches and its failure to seek immediate recalls.

headline.main: G.M. Report on Recalls Is Expected Thursday
headline.print_headline: Report Is Expected Thursday on Delay in Recalls by G.M.
